title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 91.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 91.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

Section
207
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law authorizes the commissioner to prescribe the form
of ticket and simplified traffic information to be used in all traffic
violation cases (except parking), and to establish administrative control over
the disposition thereof. Under the provisions of such section, the commissioner
may require trial courts having jurisdiction of traffic cases to report as to
the disposition thereof, and may limit the application of rules and
regulations, promulgated to administer and enforce the provisions of section
207, so as to include or exclude specific violations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
91.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
